verses.verse: In the eighth<WH8066> month,<WH2320> in the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius,<WH1867> came<WH1961> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> unto<WH413> Zechariah,<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Berechiah,<WH1296> the son<WH1121> of Iddo<WH5714> the prophet,<WH5030> saying,<WH559>
The LORD<WH3068> hath been sore displeased<WH7107> <WH7110> with<WH5921> your fathers.<WH1>

Therefore say<WH559> thou unto<WH413> them, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> Turn<WH7725> ye unto<WH413> me, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> and I will turn<WH7725> unto<WH413> you, saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

Be <WH1961> ye not<WH408> as your fathers,<WH1> unto<WH413> whom<WH834> the former<WH7223> prophets<WH5030> have cried,<WH7121> saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> Turn<WH7725> ye now<WH4994> from your evil<WH7451> ways,<WH4480> <WH1870> and from your evil<WH7451> doings:<WH4611> but they did not<WH3808> hear,<WH8085> nor<WH3808> hearken<WH7181> unto<WH413> me, saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>
Your fathers,<WH1> where<WH346> are they?<WH1992> and the prophets,<WH5030> do they live<WH2421> forever?<WH5769>

But <WH389> my words<WH1697> and my statutes,<WH2706> which<WH834> I commanded<WH6680> <WH853> my servants<WH5650> the prophets,<WH5030> did they not<WH3808> take hold<WH5381> of your fathers?<WH1> and they returned<WH7725> and said,<WH559> Like as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> thought<WH2161> to do<WH6213> unto us, according to our ways,<WH1870> and according to our doings,<WH4611> so<WH3651> hath he dealt<WH6213> with<WH854> us.

Upon the four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> day<WH3117> of the eleventh<WH6249> <WH6240> month,<WH2320> which<WH1931> is the month<WH2320> Sebat,<WH7627> in the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius,<WH1867> came<WH1961> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> unto<WH413> Zechariah,<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Berechiah,<WH1296> the son<WH1121> of Iddo<WH5714> the prophet,<WH5030> saying,<WH559>

I saw<WH7200> by night,<WH3915> and behold<WH2009> a man<WH376> riding<WH7392> upon<WH5921> a red<WH122> horse,<WH5483> and he<WH1931> stood<WH5975> among<WH996> the myrtle trees<WH1918> that<WH834> were in the bottom;<WH4699> and behind<WH310> him were there red<WH122> horses,<WH5483> speckled,<WH8320> and white.<WH3836>

Then said<WH559> I, O my lord,<WH113> what<WH4100> are these?<WH428> And the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, I<WH589> will show<WH7200> thee what<WH4100> these<WH428> be.

And the man<WH376> that stood<WH5975> among<WH996> the myrtle trees<WH1918> answered<WH6030> and said,<WH559> These<WH428> are they whom<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath sent<WH7971> to walk to and fro<WH1980> through the earth.<WH776>

And they answered<WH6030> <WH853> the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> that stood<WH5975> among<WH996> the myrtle trees,<WH1918> and said,<WH559> We have walked to and fro<WH1980> through the earth,<WH776> and, behold,<WH2009> all<WH3605> the earth<WH776> sitteth still,<WH3427> and is at rest.<WH8252>

Then the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> answered<WH6030> and said,<WH559> O LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> how long<WH5704> <WH4970> wilt thou<WH859> not<WH3808> have mercy on<WH7355> <WH853> Jerusalem<WH3389> and on the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> against which<WH834> thou hast had indignation<WH2194> these<WH2088> threescore and ten<WH7657> years?<WH8141>
And the LORD<WH3068> answered<WH6030> <WH853> the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me with good<WH2896> words<WH1697> and comfortable<WH5150> words.<WH1697>

So the angel<WH4397> that communed<WH1696> with me said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Cry<WH7121> thou, saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> I am jealous<WH7065> for Jerusalem<WH3389> and for Zion<WH6726> with a great<WH1419> jealousy.<WH7068>

And I<WH589> am very<WH1419> sore displeased<WH7107> <WH7110> with<WH5921> the heathen<WH1471> that are at ease:<WH7600> for<WH834> I<WH589> was but a little<WH4592> displeased,<WH7107> and they<WH1992> helped<WH5826> forward the affliction.<WH7451>

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> I am returned<WH7725> to Jerusalem<WH3389> with mercies:<WH7356> my house<WH1004> shall be built<WH1129> in it, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> and a line<WH6957> shall be stretched forth<WH5186> upon<WH5921> Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Cry <WH7121> yet,<WH5750> saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> My cities<WH5892> through prosperity<WH4480> <WH2896> shall yet<WH5750> be spread abroad;<WH6327> and the LORD<WH3068> shall yet<WH5750> comfort<WH5162> <WH853> Zion,<WH6726> and shall yet<WH5750> choose<WH977> Jerusalem.<WH3389>
Then lifted I up<WH5375> <WH853> mine eyes,<WH5869> and saw,<WH7200> and behold<WH2009> four<WH702> horns.<WH7161>

And I said<WH559> unto<WH413> the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me, What<WH4100> be these?<WH428> And he answered<WH559> <WH413> me, These<WH428> are the horns<WH7161> which<WH834> have scattered<WH2219> <WH853> Judah,<WH3063> <WH853> Israel,<WH3478> and Jerusalem.<WH3389>
And the LORD<WH3068> showed<WH7200> me four<WH702> carpenters.<WH2796>

Then said<WH559> I, What<WH4100> come<WH935> these<WH428> to do?<WH6213> And he spoke,<WH559> saying,<WH559> These<WH428> are the horns<WH7161> which<WH834> have scattered<WH2219> <WH853> Judah,<WH3063> so that no<WH3808> man<WH376> did lift up<WH5375> his head:<WH7218> but these<WH428> are come<WH935> to frighten<WH2729> them, to cast out<WH3034> <WH853> the horns<WH7161> of the Gentiles,<WH1471> which lifted up<WH5375> their horn<WH7161> over<WH413> the land<WH776> of Judah<WH3063> to scatter<WH2219> it.
